title: Atharva Divekar
education: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering, Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Pune, Maharashtra, Expected May 2025, GPA: 9.08
experience:
Research Intern - NonInvasive method for Blood Glucose Estimation using PPG Signals, Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Sept 2023  Feb 2024
 Explored the Photoplethysmography (PPG) signals using various processing techniques in Python and R.
 Extracted relevant features from the PPG waveforms using references to correlate with the target feature (blood glucose).
 Conducted and explored various feature selection and engineering techniques to further reduce the Mean Squared Error (MSE) loss.
 Trained and tested multiple machine learning algorithms on the extracted feature set, tuning the parameters to achieve a cross-validation accuracy of 92%.
 Attempted to develop a mathematical model from the top 5 features that had the highest correlation with the target feature (blood glucose).
